.. _nested:

======
Nested
======

This test case has a nested hierarchy of docs.

I'm not sure if there's a reason to keep or discard the following
section title ("contents" gets treated specially all over the place, it
seems) but it should at the very least show the toctree here instead of
in a separate doctree.

Contents
========

   wester.rst
   agca.rst
